flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=4100>>4100
So there was 4100-1000=$<<4100-1000=3100>>3100 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 3100*0.1=$<<3100*0.1=310>>310
So his purchase came out to 4100-310=$<<4100-310=3790>>3790
#### 3790

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1400, not 4100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
